MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 and PA3 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Gilmour Street  and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.35AM.  Our engineers have arrived onsite and confirmed we have a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.17AM on 30th November 2020.
